targets.query: SELECT last("temp") FROM "temp" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used") FROM "disk" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("cpu")  / 1000 FROM "exec_pi_temp" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(mean("total_threads"), 10) FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(mean("interrupts")) FROM "kernel" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(mean("context_switches")) FROM "kernel" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("query_time_ms") FROM "dns_query" WHERE ("server" = '8.8.8.8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("query_time_ms") FROM "dns_query" WHERE ("server" = '8.8.8.8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("query_time_ms") FROM "dns_query" WHERE ("server" = '8.8.8.8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("result_code") FROM "dns_query" WHERE ("server" = 'pihole' AND "domain" = 'rileylabrecque.com') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("average_response_ms") FROM "ping" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "url" fill(null)
SELECT distinct("percent_packet_loss") FROM "ping" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
